Package ba.unsa.etf.rpr.projekat

Class DAO

java.lang.Object
ba.unsa.etf.rpr.projekat.DAO
public class DAO
extends java.lang.Object
Data access object layer, singleton connection to database.

    • userExists

      private int userExists​(java.lang.String userName, java.lang.String password)
      Checks if user exist in database.
      Parameters:
